title: Dark Paradise
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:15.94] All my friends tell me I should move on
[00:19.86] I'm lying in the ocean, singing your song
[00:23.89] Ahh
[00:28.08] That's how you sang it
[00:31.80] Loving you forever can't be wrong
[00:36.19] Even though you're not here, won't move on
[00:39.86] Ahh
[00:43.74] That's how we played it
[00:46.49] And there's no remedy for memory, your face is like a melody
[00:51.89] It won't leave my head
[00:54.93] Your soul is haunting me and telling me that everything is fine
[00:59.70] But I wish I was dead (dead, like you)
[01:03.86] Every time I close my eyes, it's like a dark paradise
[01:11.09] No one compares to you
[01:13.47] I'm scared that you won't be waiting on the other side
[01:19.99] Every time I close my eyes, it's like a dark paradise
[01:27.04] No one compares to you
[01:29.70] I'm scared that you won't be waiting on the other side
[01:35.91] All my friends ask me why I stay strong
[01:40.09] Tell 'em when you find true love, it lives on
[01:43.71] Ahh
[01:47.82] That's why I stay here
[01:50.40] And there's no remedy for memory, your face is like a melody
[01:55.83] It won't leave my head
[01:58.95] Your soul is haunting me and telling me that everything is fine
[02:03.70] But I wish I was dead (dead, like you)
[02:08.02] Every time I close my eyes, it's like a dark paradise
[02:15.02] No one compares to you
[02:17.66] I'm scared that you won't be waiting on the other side
[02:24.12] Every time I close my eyes, it's like a dark paradise
[02:31.16] No one compares to you
[02:33.80] But there's no you, except in my dreams tonight
[02:38.69] Oh-oh-oh-oh-hah-hah-hah-hah
[02:43.05] I don't want to wake up from this tonight
[02:46.48] Oh-oh-oh-oh-hah-hah-hah-hah
[02:51.09] I don't want to wake up from this tonight
[02:55.75] There's no relief, I see you in my sleep
[02:59.94] And everybody's rushing me, but I can feel you touching me
[03:03.74] There's no release, I feel you in my dreams
[03:07.84] Telling me I'm fine
[03:11.94] Every time I close my eyes, it's like a dark paradise
[03:18.88] No one compares to you
[03:21.74] I'm scared that you won't be waiting on the other side
[03:27.81] Every time I close my eyes, it's like a dark paradise
[03:35.07] No one compares to you
[03:37.82] But there's no you, except in my dreams tonight
[03:42.52] Oh-oh-oh-oh-hah-hah-hah-hah
[03:47.04] I don't want to wake up from this tonight
[03:50.56] Oh-oh-oh-oh-hah-hah-hah-hah
[03:55.07] I don't want to wake up from this tonight
[03:57.79]
